description: Sewn loops of 10.5 mm Dyneema® webbing. Lightweight and low profile, they are ideal for building anchors and for use as extendable quickdraws. The 120 and 240 cm lengths are long enough to be equalized in anchors and the 60 cm is the right length for tripling as extendable quickdraws with lightweight carabiners.
name: 10.5mm Express Dyneema Runner - 60cm
